title: Another Teen Mega-Talent Hits the Big Time: Visma-Lease a Bike Signs 18-Year-Old Through 2027
content:
Matthew Brennan earns blockbuster contract with Visma-Lease a Bike 'super team' as hunt for Tour de France champions hits fast-forward.

Read the full article at Another Teen Mega-Talent Hits the Big Time: Visma-Lease a Bike Signs 18-Year-Old Through 2027 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
